name: Consumed (Sspeeder)
description:
Game Objective: Navigate through the maze to find oil deposits to maintain the fuel in your light. Don't let the light run out, or you'll be consumed by the darkness! Survive for as long as you can!

Made for Game Jam Aotearoa 2021 by: Brett Cooper, Chantal DuxField, Jennifer Craig, and music composition by Hamish Oliver
